1. ggthemes
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(ggthemes))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(ggplot2))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(purrr))

df <- data.frame( x=1:50, y=rnorm(50,mean=5,sd=1), z=sample(x=LETTERS[1:4],50,replace = T) )

element.names <- c("base","calc","clean","economist","excel","excel_new","few","fivethirtyeight","foundation","gdocs","hc","igray","map","pander","par","solarized","solid","stata","tufte","wsj")

lapply( element.names, function(x){
  ggplot(df,aes(x,y,color=z))+geom_point() + eval(parse(text=paste0("theme_",x,"()")))
} )
```
